backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining data models (JobListing, ExamResult, AdmitCard, NewsUpdate, GovernmentScheme) and CRUD operations with comparison functions for sorting by dates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs for homepage, jobs, results, admit cards, news, and schemes sections.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of all frontend components including pages, layout components, cards, filters, and custom hooks for data fetching.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors, borders, and component styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining routes for all pages (home, jobs, results, admit cards, news, schemes) wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/admitcards/Admit: Admit card display component showing exam details, dates, download link, instructions, and highlighting upcoming exams with countdown badges.
Filter controls for admit cards page with organization dropdown and exam date range pickers, including clear filters functionality.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedUpd: Displays the latest updates from five categories (jobs, results, admit cards, news, schemes) in a grid layout with loading states, formatted dates, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Renders the homepage hero section with a background image, gradient overlay, title, description, and five quick-access cards linking to main portal sections.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Displays a single job listing card with title, organization, vacancy count, location, deadline, active/closed status badge, and days-left indicator.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobDetailsM: Modal component showing detailed job information including status, post name, vacancies, location, dates, qualification, salary, and application link with formatted dates.
Provides filtering UI for job listings with search/select inputs for qualification, location, organization, and status, plus a clear-all-filters button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with three columns (about, quick links, disclaimer), copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo, site title, desktop navigation menu, and mobile hamburger menu that toggles a dropdown navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Root layout component that wraps all pages with Header, main content area (Outlet), and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Displays a single news update card with category badge, headline, summary, publication date, source, and external link. Formats bigint timestamps to readable dates.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsFilters: Provides search and category filtering UI for news updates. Extracts unique categories from news data and includes a clear filters button.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultCa: Displays an exam result card showing exam name, organization, declaration date, roll number range, category info, and a link to view the result. Formats bigint timestamps to readable dates.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultFi: Provides filtering UI for exam results with search, organization dropdown, and date range inputs. Extracts unique organizations from results data and includes a clear filters button.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeCa: Displays a clickable government scheme card with ministry badge, scheme name, description, key benefits preview, and application process preview. Triggers onClick callback when clicked.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeDe: Full-screen modal displaying complete government scheme details including description, eligibility criteria, benefits, application process, launch date, and official website link. Formats bigint timestamps to readable dates.
frontend/src/components/schemes/SchemeFi: Provides filtering UI for government schemes with ministry/department dropdown and eligibility criteria search input. Extracts unique ministries from schemes data and includes a clear filters button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity state. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating government portal data (job listings, exam results, admit cards, news, schemes) using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining an orange and teal color scheme for light and dark modes, styled for an India government portal.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdmitCardsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable list of admit cards for government exams, sorted by exam date with organization and date range filters.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with a hero section and featured updates components.
frontend/src/pages/JobsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable grid of government job listings with qualification, location, organization, and status filters, plus a modal for job details.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows a filterable grid of government news updates with search and category filters.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Displays exam results in a filterable list with search by exam name, organization, and date range. Shows loading skeletons and empty states when no results match filters.
frontend/src/pages/SchemesPage.tsx: Displays government schemes in a filterable grid layout with filters for ministry and eligibility. Includes a modal for viewing detailed scheme information.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color system using OKLCH, extended spacing, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining the India Government portal with architectural notes, existing features for jobs/results/admit cards/news/schemes pages, and image requirements for icons and backgrounds.
